title: Where is Take Me Out filmed and when it is on?
text:
There’s a new Flirty Thirty on the way… (Picture: ITV / Thames / Fremantle)

To paraphrase host Paddy McGuinness, it’s almost time to let the Venga see the boys as the new series of Take Me Out is due to start in a matter of hours.

The show sees a group of 30 single women – which this year includes none other than Samuel Jackson’s bodyguard – choose from a selection of bachelors, and it is just about to start its 11th season.

As we wait to see who among the Flirty Thirty will be jetting off to the Isle of Fernandos with a new paramour, here’s what you need to know about where the show is filmed and when it will be on…

Where is Take Me Out filmed?

According to the Kent Film Office website, Take Me Out is filmed in Kent at The Maidstone Studios.

All seasons but the first were filmed there, with season one being shot at Granada Studios in Manchester.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Tonight, 26 October, the popular dating show will begin its 11th season at 7:15pm.

On the subject of the show’s cast, host Paddy, 46, has said: ‘It’s pointless having four male models and thirty female models behind the podiums, because life’s not like that.

‘Everyday life is about different people from different walks of life, all different shapes and sizes and different interests.’

The Top Gear Host also teased an upcoming 80’s special episode, explaining: ‘It’s celebrating the 80’s, so I’ve gone back to my Miami Vice days. I’ll be in a white suit with a past vest and all the girls will have big hair.

‘The music and everything about the show will be 80’s. I’m really looking forward to that, it’ll be a lot of fun.’

Take Me Out returns Saturday at 7.15pm on ITV.

description: To paraphrase host Paddy McGuinness, it's almost time to let the Venga see the boys as the new series of Take Me Out is due to start soon.
